gen:link.msg:message: Het totaal van `InvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther` gerapporteerd met `InvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOtherAxis` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `InvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther` zonder `InvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOtherAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsLandBuildingInvestmentsLandBuildingsOtherSpecificationInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetTInvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsLandBuildingInvestmentsLandBuildingsOtherSpecificationInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetTInvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsLandBuildingInvestmentsLandBuildingsOtherSpecificationInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetNTInvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsLandBuildingInvestmentsLandBuildingsOtherSpecificationInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetNTInvestmentsInLandAndBuildingsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
